descript.abstract: The City of Philadelphia has migrated metadata for this data set to the City-wide Metadata Catalog. For any questions about the migration and administration of the Metadata Catalog, please contact maps@phila.gov. To view the metadata for this layer, please visit:http://metadata.phila.gov/#home/datasetdetails/5543864920583086178c4e87/representationdetails/55438a889b989a05172d0d07/
descript.purpose: This point layer contains all the wastewater and stormwater inlet locations. The Purpose of this data is to describe the asset both locationally and via its attributes which are extensive for a GIS dataset and which are maintained. This data will serve as a platform for planning, analysis and research at PWD.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 StatePlane Pennsylvania South FIPS 3702 Feet

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Denotes the PWD system the feature is part of.
Who is responsible for the maintenance of the feature.
Name of the owner of the facility.
Rotation angle of the facility relative to the attached pipelines. (used for symbol rotation)
Code denoting the type of facility represented. Differentiates features based on their connectivity rules.
Refers to symbol name in PWD custom stylesheets.
Type of inlet where noted on the source.
An identifier for the asset that allows searching through a specific feature class. It is comprised of the feature class id and sequential number. This is not a unique value.
Indicates whether or not the feature has been physically located using GPS equipment.
Unique identifier used for hydraulic modeling

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
